document.discussion_title: Your Questions About Irish Dancers Costumes
document.topic_text: Your Questions About Irish Dancers Costumes Friday, August 19th, 2016 at 5:00 am Lizzie asks… Good Halloween Costume? I am an Irish dancer and I wanted tojustbethatfor halloween, butihavehad trouble finding a dress for normal dance class let alone for halloween. I likehow riverdance’s dresses arereally simple andeasy looking andthey seem easytomakeor find…. and I am alsoa HUGE fan ofthe twilight series….any ideas ppl?? please help! I♥the irish dancer thing! But ihaveno idea where u canfinda costume thing sry=.[
